CustomField.formula:
If ( AND( Additional_Discount_Percentage__c = 0 ,ISNULL (Unit_Price_After_Volume_Discount__c), Additional_Discount_Amount__c =0 ),
( Contracted_MW_Unit_List_Price__c * PPT_Prorate_Multiplier__c ) ,
If (AND ( Additional_Discount_Percentage__c = 0,NOT( ISNULL( Unit_Price_After_Volume_Discount__c )),Additional_Discount_Amount__c =0),
(Unit_Price_After_Volume_Discount__c * PPT_Prorate_Multiplier__c) ,
If( AND( Additional_Discount_Percentage__c != 0 ,ISNULL( Unit_Price_After_Volume_Discount__c ),Additional_Discount_Amount__c =0),
(Contracted_MW_Unit_List_Price__c * ((100 - ((Additional_Discount_Percentage__c)*100))/100) * PPT_Prorate_Multiplier__c),
If( AND(Additional_Discount_Percentage__c != 0,NOT(ISNULL( Unit_Price_After_Volume_Discount__c )),Additional_Discount_Amount__c =0),
(Unit_Price_After_Volume_Discount__c * ((100 - ((Additional_Discount_Percentage__c)*100))/100) * PPT_Prorate_Multiplier__c),
If ( AND( Additional_Discount_Amount__c =0 ,ISNULL (Unit_Price_After_Volume_Discount__c),Additional_Discount_Percentage__c = 0 ),
(Contracted_MW_Unit_List_Price__c * PPT_Prorate_Multiplier__c) ,
If (AND ( Additional_Discount_Amount__c =0,NOT( ISNULL( Unit_Price_After_Volume_Discount__c )), Additional_Discount_Percentage__c = 0),
(Unit_Price_After_Volume_Discount__c * PPT_Prorate_Multiplier__c) ,
If( AND(Additional_Discount_Amount__c != 0,ISNULL( Unit_Price_After_Volume_Discount__c ),Additional_Discount_Percentage__c = 0),
((Contracted_MW_Unit_List_Price__c - Additional_Discount_Amount__c) * PPT_Prorate_Multiplier__c),
If( AND(Additional_Discount_Amount__c != 0,NOT(ISNULL( Unit_Price_After_Volume_Discount__c )),Additional_Discount_Percentage__c = 0),
((Unit_Price_After_Volume_Discount__c - Additional_Discount_Amount__c) * PPT_Prorate_Multiplier__c),
If( AND(Additional_Discount_Amount__c = 0,NOT(ISNULL( Unit_Price_After_Volume_Discount__c )),NOT(ISNULL(Contracted_MW_Unit_List_Price__c )),Additional_Discount_Percentage__c = 0),
(Unit_Price_After_Volume_Discount__c * PPT_Prorate_Multiplier__c),
NULL)))))))))
CustomField.label: Net Unit Price
